Package chat.belinked

Class GameAPI

java.lang.Object
chat.belinked.GameAPI
public class GameAPI extends Object
Main class of the Game API, used for basic cloudnet stuff + XP, Coins and Nick requests

    • request

      public String request(String type, String key, UUID uuid, String amount)
      Method for a basic POST request to the WebClient API
      Parameters:
      type - Specifies the type of the request, in this case either 'read' or 'write'
      key - Specifies the key of the request, e.g. getCoins
      uuid - The uuid of the player in the database
      amount - Optional, if not required, '', sets the amount of a write request, e.g. for addCoins: 20
      Returns:
      A json string containing the http response
